definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: Google can shut down its phone manufacturing operations, or sell it off.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌可以关停手机生产部门，或是再次将其出售。

sentences.english: Again, let him get used to the fastened halter for several days.
sentences.chinese: 再次，让他习惯了被系阿尔泰了好几天。

sentences.english: Then when you get older and think back, you’ll be able to enjoy it a second time.
sentences.chinese: 当你年老回首往事时，便能再次享受你的一生。

sentences.english: May I have your name again,please.
Delaying reimplantation till at least 6 months after resection.
sentences.chinese: 再次植入应在切除术后至少6个月。

sentences.english: In the moment and again the flash across is that girl's face, Qiong's eventually preoccupied of her is who.
sentences.chinese: 眼前再次闪过那个女孩的脸，琼终于想起了她是谁。

sentences.english: Not now, not since I bumped into him again.
sentences.chinese: 现在没有，从我再次撞见他以来都没有。

sentences.english: The more modern face of China reasserts itself a few hours later in the district of Kundu.
sentences.chinese: 中国更为现代的面貌在昆都数小时后再次体现。

sentences.english: Since I hope to see you again, I'll say au revoir rather than adieu.
sentences.chinese: 因为我希望再次见你，我将说再见，而非告别。

sentences.english: At three-fifteen the following afternoon, Persky worked his wizardry again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天下午三点十五分，帕斯基再次施展魔法。

sentences.english: Eastern Front, the opposition attack again Zili Tan 19.
sentences.chinese: 东线战场上，反对派19日再次进攻兹利坦。

sentences.english: We’re reaffirming our commitment to always keep faith with their families.
sentences.chinese: 我们再次重申我们与他们的家人在精神上始终在一起。

sentences.english: Well, the reason I think essentially is again back to the civilization state.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我认为实质上，原因得再次追溯到这文明国家。

sentences.english: The bottom? Baghdad once again comes in at 215.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克的巴格达无疑再次中标。

sentences.english: Again determined to rule out a reaction to textures, the neurologists tested her with colored light.
sentences.chinese: 再次决心排除反应纹理，神经学家测试与彩色光她。

definition: to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
